abstract: Terry Nichols, currently serving multiple life sentences for Oklahoma City bombings, files request to Judge Richard Matsch of Federal District Court in Denver seeking guns seized by federal authorities from his gun show business to be returned and sold to support his adult children.
lead_paragraph: Terry Nichols, who is serving multiple life sentences in the Oklahoma City bombings, wants his guns returned to him so his family can sell them to support his adult children.

headline.main: Oklahoma: Federal Building Bomber Seeks Return of His Guns
headline.print_headline: Oklahoma: Federal Building Bomber Seeks Return of His Guns

snippet: Terry Nichols, who is serving multiple life sentences in the Oklahoma City bombings, wants his guns returned to him so his family can sell them to support his adult children.
